name: East Coast Symposium
content: When it comes to treating addiction, we’re stronger together. Previously known as NCAD East, next year we’ll return to Baltimore as the East Coast Symposium; new name, same great meeting. At the East Coast Symposium, you’ll find yourself among like-minded peers, learning and addressing the significant challenges we must overcome. Join us as we rise above the challenges, reverse the numbers, and recover together. Registration is open! Facebook https://go.evvnt.com/981267-2?pid=4868 LinkedIn https://go.evvnt.com/981267-3?pid=4868 Prices: Opening Rate - CME/CE Attendee USD 425.00 Super Saver Rate - CME/CE Attendee USD 499.00 Last Chance Rate - CME/CE Attendee USD 525.00 Standard Rate - CME/CE Attendee USD 599.00 Opening Rate - Non-CME/CE Attendee USD 599.00 Super Saver Rate - Non-CME/CE Attendee USD 599.00 Last Chance Rate - Non-CME/CE Attendee USD 625.00 Standard Rate - Non-CME/CE Attendee USD 699.00 Student/Resident/Fellow USD 199.00 Date and Time: Starts: Fri, Aug 19, 2022 ( 8:00 AM) and Ends: Sun, Aug 21, 2022 ( 6:00 PM) Venue details: Hilton Baltimore Inner Harbor, 401 West Pratt Street, Baltimore, Maryland, 21201, United States
